travel.quarantine: Only passengers travelling from red zone countries will have to quarantine on arrival

indoorDining.allowed: Indoor dining is permitted under certain conditions
indoorDining.vaccination: Each customer must present proof of vaccination
indoorDining.proof: EU Covid Certificate, HSE Vaccination Record with matching photo identification
indoorDining.tableLimit: 6 people aged 13 and over or 15 people including children aged 12 and over
indoorDining.faceCovering: Must be worn when not sitting at the table
indoorDining.contactTracing: Details must be give by one group member for contact tracing

outdoorDining.tableLimit: 6 people aged 13 and over or 15 people including children aged 12 and over
outdoorDining.faceCovering: Must be worn when not sitting at the table
outdoorDining.contactTracing: Details must be give by one group member for contact tracing
